content: learn to crochet the flower power hexagon potholder - a cute and functional kitchen accessory this fun hexagon design uses less than 1 skein of yarn making it a perfect stash-buster project this potholder is made up of 2 different hexagons front and back that are joined together as you crochet to make a double thick potholder this means that you can use it safely in your kitchen without burning your hands or counters > this potholder pattern is the 8th pattern in the ** 2023 pot holders galore crochet-along 1 ** with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 12 +1 bonus potholder patterns one pattern every month during the crochet-along in december you ll receive the final potholder along with the bonus pattern > the free pattern for the flower power hexagon potholder can be found ** here 2 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 3 ** > you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along ** here 4 ** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms size this potholder measures 8 5 wide x 9 5 long but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 150 yds / 138 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-flower-power-hexagon-potholder/ 3 https //youtu be/w04pdgyhbmu 4 https //thispixiecreates com/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023-main-page/
